abstract: Some prominent advertisers, including Prudential and Citigroup, have pulled their sponsorships of NBC’s Golden Globes coverage, and others still are weighing their options, according to media buyers.
lead_paragraph: Some prominent advertisers, including Prudential and Citigroup, have pulled their sponsorships of NBC’s Golden Globes coverage, and others still are weighing their options, according to media buyers.

headline.main: Sponsors Start to Flee Golden Globes
